sourcesContent:
<template>
    <video-player :options="playerOptions"></video-player>
</template> 

<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            playerOptions: {
                muted: false,
                languages: "zh-CN",
                playbackRates: [0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0], //播放速度
                height: "360",
                sources: [
                    {
                        type: "video/mp4",
                        src:
                            "http://www.w3school.com.cn/example/html5/mov_bbb.mp4"
                    }
                ],
                autoplay: false,
                controls: true
            }
        };
    }
};
</script>

<style lang="stylus" scoped>
>>> .vjs-big-play-button {
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    border-radius: 50%;
    width: 2em;
    height: 2em;
    line-height: 2em;
}
</style>
